|brand = CalAmp |model = LMU-5000 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = Rev G1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 14 May 2024 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/CalAmp_LMU-5000 |wlclass = LTE |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = LTE router, GPS Tracker |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = N7NMC7700 |icid = 2417C-MC7700 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = PWB 134023 REV G |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atmel;AT91SAM9G20; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM926 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 400 <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SLC NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MT29F1G08ABADAH4-IT:D; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = NOR |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Atmel;AT45DB081D; |flash2size = 1 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Micron;MT41J256M4JP-125:G; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = National Semiconductor;DP83848; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (Female Micro-B), Mini PCIe (USB only), SIM Card slot |exp_sim_num = 1 |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 9-30 |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_conn = Molex (4-pin)
|serial = yes,, console port (DE-9),, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = GSM, GPRS, UMTS, EDGE, HSDPA, HSPA+, 4G LTE, GPS, SIM Card slot, RTC, Li-Ion battery, DIO, UART |addchip = 3-5V True RS232 Transceiver;TI;MAX3237;;1;,,, SPI Real Time Clock/Calendar;NXP;PCF2123;;1;,,, Standard Precision GNSS Module,ublox;NEO-M9N;;1;,,, Serial to 1-Wire Line Driver;Maxim Integrated;DS2480B;;2;,,, Low Offset Voltage Dual Comparators;Fairchild;LM2903;;4;,,, Octal Buffers/Drivers w/ 3-State Outputs;TI;SN74LVC541A;;1;,,, 16-bit I/O Expander with Serial Interface;Microchip;MCP23S17;;2;,,, P-Channel 2.5V Specified PowerTrench MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS6375;;1;,,, 8-Channel 50 kSPS to 200 kSPS 10-bit A/D Converter;TI;ADC108S022;;1; |802dot11_protocols = LTE
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/04/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B082YHJSBH |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = USA
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Sierra Wireless AirPrime MC7700 |rad1modif = Mini PCIe (USB) |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = <!-- true, --> |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm;MDM9200; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1stand = LTE
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|CalAmp LMU-5531HP Router GPS}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Atmel]]'' AT91SAM9G20 :Single-core ARM926 @400MHz *Memory: 64MB (DDR3) SDRAM *Storage: 1MB (NOR) Flash, :128MB (SLC NAND) Flash *Cellular: 3G/4G LTE *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet ports *USB: 1x USB 2.0, 1x USB (OTG) ports *Power: 9-28V, via 4-pin Molex
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.getwirelessllc.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/LMU-5531.pdf Datasheet]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/calamp/calamp_lmu-5000 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = at91 |subtarget = sam9x |arch = arm_arm926ej-s |support_started_version = 14.07 |current_supported_version = 23.05.3 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
